text: Wish I could join you on the march today - but I have done my bit by signing the petition:
author: speedupdating

text: Great to see! Did you know that the @WelshGovernment supported Data Science Team @centricaplc in Cardiff is helping our colleagues in N America push better energy management to businesses over the pond to help them #decarbonise
author: speedupdating

text:
So as #LowCarbonWales @WelshGovernment event moves on to what we can bring to the table, here’s something my colleagues @CentricaSoln_UK & I put together...
https://www.centricabusinesssolutions.com/sites/g/files/qehiga126/files/documents/Powering_Wales_Leaflet_2018.pdf …
#PoweringWales
author: speedupdating

text: And as Prys Davies for @WelshGovernment says this #LowCarbonWales will only be delivered by a Team Wales approach!
author: speedupdating

text: Plus a new national forest    for  too
author: speedupdating

text: these are some of the priorities that the @fmwales has chosen to highlight in #LowCarbonWales
author: speedupdating

text: 4) Set up a Climate Justice Advisory Group - objective will be to ensure that the transition to decarbonisation doesn’t hit hardest those who can least afford to pay
author: speedupdating

text: 3) New policy to decarbonise transport - the document being published shows a requirement for new housing developments to have quota of EV charging points - a GB first
author: speedupdating

text: 2) Move to a new energy system to enable greater local ownership of renewable schemes so that Wales has more control of outcomes
author: speedupdating

text: 1) There will be a new group to decarbonise Wales’s industrial sector, recognising that we have legacy issues not found elsewhere
author: speedupdating

text: At the historic Coal Exchange for the launch of @WelshGovernment #LowCarbonWales - kicking off with @JaneBryngwyn inspiring us with the prospect of Wales leading on low carbon prosperity. Time to harness the energy of everyone in the room.
author: speedupdating

text: It’s Tom & Jerry’s in Thamel if u want to join the #WALESVIRELAND party in Kathmandu!
author: speedupdating

text: Found a bar in #Kathmandu to watch #walesvireland
author: speedupdating

text: Crunch time in #Kathmandu - where can we watch #WALvIRE in Thamel with #Irish & #Welsh fans?
author: speedupdating

text: @Richard_Nepal a group of us from Wales who have been trekking for the Brick Children’s School would welcome suggestions on where we might catch #walesvireland #SixNations2019 later! Thanks
author: speedupdating

text: Shwmae @UKinNepal - where would you advise a dozen of us who have been trekking to raise funds to school kids in the Kathmandu brick fields to catch #WALvIRE  tomorrow? #brickschooltobasecamp with @ITVCaroleGreen @JeremyGrange01 @rodneyberman
author: speedupdating

text: Best 500 Nepali rupees I have ever spent Norrie - has opened up so many lovely conversations with locals. Persuaded the  squaddie out here to meet the gurkhas to get one!
author: speedupdating

text: This week’s #FridayFeeIing has been the end of #brickschooltobasecamp trek dancing in Kathmandu - bringing in tourists & locals alike #internationalism at its best! Enjoy your weekends, pawb!
author: speedupdating
